meanings.definition: Not growing or increasing in size or amount.
meanings.sent1: The plant in the corner is nongrowing.
meanings.sent2: The desert is full of nongrowing cacti.
meanings.sent3: The turtle decided to join the nongrowing race.
meanings.sent4: Her nongrowing patience finally wore thin.
meanings.sent5: The nongrowing shadow of the tree stretched across the yard.

meanings.sent1: The abandoned building stood nongrowing for years.
meanings.sent2: The project remained nongrowing due to lack of funding.
meanings.sent3: The joke fell flat in the nongrowing silence.
meanings.sent4: His nongrowing interest in the subject was evident.
meanings.sent5: The nongrowing relationship between the two countries led to tension.
